titleStmt.title: Brahmasūtra of Bādarāyaṇa with the Bhāṣya of Ānandatīrtha (Mādhava)

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: A palm leaf manuscript containing Adhyāya 1-4 of Brahmasūtra of Bādarāyaṇa with the Bhāṣya of Ānandatīrtha.

msItem.title: Brahmasūtra of Bādarāyaṇa with the Bhāṣya of Ānandatīrtha (Mādhava)
msItem.author: Bādarāyaṇa, Ānandatīrtha (Mādhava)
msItem.rubric: śubham astu śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ śrīmate madhvapataye namaḥ hariḥ oṃ
msItem.incipit:
nārāyaṇaṃ guṇaiḥ sarvair udīrṇaṃ doṣavarjitaṃ | jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃś cāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate || dvāpare sarvatra jñāne ākulī
bhūte tannirṇayāya brahmarudreṃdrādibhir arthito bhagavān nārāyaṇo vyāsatvenāvatatāra |
msItem.explicit: nityānaṃdo hariḥ pūrṇo nityadāṃ prīyatāṃ mama | namas tasmai namas tasmai namas tasmai ca viṣṇave ||—||
msItem.finalRubric:
iti śrīmadkṛṣṇadvaipāyanakṛtabraṃhmasūtrabhāṣye śrīmadānaṃdatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracite caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ ||—|| śrī śrī śrī śrī ||—||
śubham astu ||—||—||—|| śrīnivāsāya maṃgalaṃ ||—|| ❈ | ❈ ||

extent.measure: 3 guard folios inserted at the beginning of the bundle, 103 numbered folios (f. 78 doubled), 2 guard folios at the end.

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, on the left margin of the recto, 1 to 103, with number 78 doubled.
supportDesc.condition: Partly good condition, partly worm-eaten. Some wear at the edges.

additions.desc: One line written on the first guard folio, in Grantha script: vādhūlaśrīnivāsāryya-kṛpāsampannavaibhavam | kauśikaśrīnivāsā ryyam kalyāṇaguṇam āśraye | maddhvasūtrabhāṣyam pukakku | 7 | 103 On the recto of the second guard folio: some writing in Nandināgarī, uninked. After 103v there is a guard foliowith two lines written per page in Nandināgarī, uninked.

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1985. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 7. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. (MS no. 2860). p. 947.

encodingDesc.p: ❈ denotes a puṣpikā. Spaces between words added where possible.
